item.title: Reducing Android Build Times on Azure by 80% using a Virtual Machine Scale Set (VMSS)
item.description: A VMSS is, put as plainly as possible, a cluster of VMs that are scaled on-demand or manually. Context The Vipps App – until recently – took about 45 minutes to build on A$ure Azure. With a weekly release schedule, that might not sound like a huge dealbreaker, but since we’re using a “feature branch” approach to how we do git (ie no develop branch; master should always be deployable-ish), we don’t allow merging anything to master without a successful cloud build.
